title: Constitutional Policy Precedence Hierarchy
purpose: Defines the precedence order for constitutional principles when conflicts arise. Lower level numbers have higher precedence.

policy_hierarchy.name: safety_boundaries
policy_hierarchy.description: Safety and security boundaries that protect humans and systems

conflict_resolution_rules.rule: When principles conflict, higher level (lower number) wins
Within same level, more specific principle wins over general
conflict_resolution_rules.example: path_based_classification overrides action_based_classification for specific files

conflict_resolution_rules.rule: If still unresolved, require human decision
conflict_resolution_rules.example: Equally specific principles at same level cannot be autonomously resolved
